oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1861 First Annual Statement of the Trade and Commerce of Memphis
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Memphis Chamber of Commerce; annual reports; business; finance; directories; 1860s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Annual statement presented by Jno. S. Toof to the Memphis Chamber of Commerce in 1861. Includes a comprehensive financial statement for various markets in the Memphis area, as well as a business directory.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Toof, Jno. S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Gift of Eric Elam (Director of Operations, Greater Memphis Chamber)
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: 1861 First Annual Statement of the Trade and Commerce of Memphis Re-Ordered - Copy
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
